... In this way vocabulary and grammar are quite intricately tied together, as you 
simply ... in other languages, such as the possessive (-m for mine, -n for yours etc
.) ... give in to becoming a crybaby that the language is different in the first place.
search_results.title: Why Turkish isn't as hard as you think! - Fluent in 3 months ...

search_results.snippet:
Sep 30, 2007 ... Use SAW ONLY when you are speaking or writing in the PAST .... Thank you for 
this article, I teach Year Six in North East England where ..... I live in Calgary and I 
am hearing the same irritating use of "seen" all over the place!
search_results.title: Grammar Guide: 25. The SAW / SEEN Spin
